title: Apotheosis of a Female Saint
provenance: Mrs. Edward D. Brandegee by purchase from Giovanni Piancastelli.
medium: Recto: pen and brown ink, brush with blue watercolor and gouache on blue paper. Verso: black and white chalk.
description: Verso contains a study for "Rest on the Flight".
name: Drawing
